title: I Don't Hate Them Anymore - OnePlus Buds Pro
description: Get 10% off all Jackery products with code LinusTechTips at   The OnePlus Buds Pro has made me confident that OnePlus can make solid wireless earbuds. Of course, there are a few bugs to work out, but so far, I'm really liking these!
